QueryResult.text: SELECT v.user_id user_key, CASE o.object_key WHEN 663 THEN 'project' WHEN 50663 THEN 'application' WHEN 50660 THEN 'asset' WHEN 51780 THEN 'idea' WHEN 50669 THEN 'other' WHEN 50666 THEN 'product' WHEN 51101 THEN 'service' ELSE o.object_code END investment_type_key, v.permission_code permission_key FROM cmn_sec_assgnd_obj_perm_r_v0 v INNER JOIN dwh_cfg_object_type o ON v.object_id = o.object_key WHERE v.permission_code in ('READ','ProjectViewManagement')
